SELECT d.d_id AS id, d.d_mac AS MAC, d.d_gw_mac AS GwMac, d.d_model AS Device, d.d_name AS NAME, d.d_feature AS Feature, d.d_active AS Active, d.d_index AS idx, d.d_create_user_id AS userId, d.d_create_time AS createTime, d.d_ele AS ele, u.u_name AS createUserName FROM vi_device d LEFT JOIN vi_user u ON d.d_create_user_id = u.u_id WHERE (d.d_room_id is null or d.d_room_id = 0) and d.d_project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT db.db_device_mac AS MAC, db.db_batt AS battery, db.db_update_time AS time, d.d_model AS deviceModel, d.d_name AS name, r.r_name AS roomName, f.f_name AS floorName, u.u_name AS unitName, b.b_name AS buildingName, c.c_name AS communityName, p.p_name AS projectName FROM ( SELECT * FROM vi_device_batt GROUP BY db_device_mac ORDER BY db_update_time DESC ) db LEFT JOIN vi_device d ON db.db_device_mac = d.d_mac LEFT JOIN vi_room r ON d.d_room_id = r.r_id LEFT JOIN vi_floor f ON f.f_id = r.r_floor_id LEFT JOIN vi_unit u ON u.u_id = f.f_unit_id LEFT JOIN vi_building b ON b.b_id = u.u_building_id LEFT JOIN vi_community c ON c.c_id = b.b_community_id LEFT JOIN vi_project p ON p.p_id = c.c_project_id WHERE d.d_project_id = #{projectId}
